article_title: French Telecom Industry Hits Snags in Efforts to Consolidate
article_text:
PARIS—Telecommunication companies' efforts to reduce the number of mobile-phone businesses in France are running into roadblocks, potentially pushing consolidation in a cutthroat European market further onto the horizon.

Ever since Bouygues Telecom's parent company Bouygues SA failed in its attempt to buy France's No. 2 mobile company by subscribers, SFR, rivals have been exploring ways to cut the number of competitors in the French...
